verbs.description: The Obama - era deal [V: had] curbed Iran 's nuclear program in exchange for a lifting of sanctions — but President Trump is abandoning it .

The Obama - era deal had curbed Iran 's nuclear program in exchange for a lifting of sanctions — but President Trump [V: is] abandoning it .
